ActJudges Act
SubjectLaurette Renaud ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Gilles Renaud
PrecisGranting of an annuity to LAURETTE RENAUD, widow of the Hon. Gilles Y. Renaud, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the District of Montreal in the Province of Quebec, effective April 10, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
